abilities.name: Veterans of the Long War
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit targets an enemy unit with a melee attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1. If that enemy unit is within range of an objective marker, you can re-roll the Wound roll instead.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: This model can be attached to the following units: Chosen, Legionaries.

abilities.name: Lord of Chaos (Aura)
abilities.description: Once per battle round, one unit from your army with this ability can use it when targeted by a Stratagem. If it does, reduce the CP cost of that Stratagem by 1CP.

abilities.name: Chance for Glory
abilities.description: Once per battle, at the start of the Fight phase, this model can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, improve the Strength, Attacks, Armor Penetration, and Damage characteristics of melee weapons equipped by this model by 1.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: This model can be attached to the following units: Chaos Terminator Squad.

abilities.name: Deep Strike
abilities.description: This unit can be set up in Reserves and deployed more than 9" from enemy models.

abilities.name: Lord of Chaos (Aura)
abilities.description: Once per battle round, one unit from your army with this ability can use it when targeted by a Stratagem. If it does, reduce the CP cost of that Stratagem by 1CP.

abilities.name: Champions of Chaos
abilities.description: Once per battle, at the start of the Fight phase, this model can use this ability. Until the end of the phase, improve the Attacks, Strength, AP, and Damage characteristics of this model's melee weapons by 1.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: This model can be attached to the following units: Accursed Cultists, Chosen, Cultist Mob, Legionaries.

abilities.name: Dark Zealotry
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.

abilities.name: Demagogue
abilities.description: Once per battle, at the start of any phase, you can select one friendly HERETIC ASTARTES unit that is Battle-shocked and within 12" of this model. That unit is no longer Battle-shocked.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: This model can be attached to the following units: Chosen, Legionaries.

abilities.name: Prescience (Psychic)
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Gift of Chaos (Psychic)
abilities.description: Once per battle, in your Shooting phase, select one enemy unit within 18" of and visible to this Psyker. That unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 2 from the result.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: This model can be attached to the following units: Chosen, Legionaries.

abilities.name: Warp-sighted Butcher
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack that targets an enemy unit that is below its Starting Strength, you can re-roll the Hit roll. If that enemy unit is below Half-strength, you can re-roll the Wound roll as well.

abilities.name: Trophy Taker
abilities.description: Each time this model destroys an enemy CHARACTER model, you gain 1CP.

abilities.name: Deadly Demise D3
abilities.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers D3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Daemonic Allegiance
abilities.description: When adding to your army, select one: KHORNE (+2 Strength), TZEENTCH (+3 Attacks to Infernal Cannon), NURGLE (+1 Toughness), or SLAANESH (+2" Movement).

abilities.name: Dark Blessing (Aura)
abilities.description: While a friendly HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit is within 6" of this model, models in that unit have the Benefit of Cover.

abilities.name: Ascended Daemon
abilities.description: Once per phase, you can re-roll one Hit roll or one Wound roll made for this model.

abilities.name: Chosen Marauders
abilities.description: This unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced or Fell Back.

abilities.name: Deep Strike
abilities.description: This unit can be set up in Reserves and deployed more than 9" from enemy models.

abilities.name: Despoilers
abilities.description: Each time this unit makes a Dark Pact, until the end of the phase, each time a model in this unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Daemonic Mutations
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit is destroyed by a melee attack, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6: on a 4+, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking model's unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

abilities.name: Unholy Frenzy
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a melee attack, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

abilities.name: For the Dark Gods
abilities.description: At the end of your Command phase, if this unit is within 6" of one or more friendly HERETIC ASTARTES units, this unit's OC characteristic is changed to 2 until the start of your next Command phase.

abilities.name: Feel No Pain 6+
abilities.description: Each time this unit would lose a wound, roll one D6: on a 6, that wound is not lost.

abilities.name: Scouts 6"
abilities.description: This unit can make a Normal move of up to 6" before the first turn begins.

abilities.name: Accursed Horde
abilities.description: Each time an enemy unit has shot, if one or more models from this unit were destroyed, this unit can make a Horde move of up to D6" toward the closest enemy unit.

choices.name: Autocannon / Heavy Bolter / Lascannon / Missile Launcher / Chaincannon

abilities.name: Stabilisation Talons
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack with a ranged weapon, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the Hit roll and any or all modifiers to the Ballistic Skill characteristic.

abilities.name: Deep Strike
abilities.description: This unit can be set up in Reserves and deployed more than 9" from enemy models.

abilities.name: Fearsome (Aura)
abilities.description: While an enemy unit is within 6" of this unit, each time that enemy unit takes a Battle-shock or Leadership test, subtract 1 from the result.

abilities.name: Terrifying Assault
abilities.description: At the start of the Fight phase, each enemy unit within Engagement Range of this unit must take a Battle-shock test.

abilities.name: Deep Strike
abilities.description: This unit can be set up in Reserves and deployed more than 9" from enemy models.

abilities.name: Warp Strike
abilities.description: At the end of the Fight phase, if one or more enemy models were destroyed by this unit's attacks this phase and this unit is not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, you can remove this unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

abilities.name: Deep Strike
abilities.description: This unit can be set up in Reserves and deployed more than 9" from enemy models.

abilities.name: Warp Rift Firepower
abilities.description: Once per battle, when this unit is selected to shoot, it can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [INDIRECT FIRE] ability.

abilities.name: Feel No Pain 5+
abilities.description: Each time this unit would lose a wound, roll one D6: on a 5+, that wound is not lost.

abilities.name: Mind-breaking Mutations (Aura)
abilities.description: While an enemy unit (excluding VEHICLE units) is within 3" of this unit, subtract 1 from the Objective Control characteristic of models in that enemy unit.

choices.name: Heavy Flamer / Plasma Cannon / Missile Launcher / Multi-melta / Twin Autocannon / Twin Heavy Bolter / Twin Lascannon
Helbrute Fist / Helbrute Hammer / Power Scourge

abilities.name: Deadly Demise 1
abilities.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers 1 mortal wound.

abilities.name: Dark Ascension (Aura)
abilities.description: While a friendly HERETIC ASTARTES unit is within 6" of this model, each time that unit makes a Dark Pact, if it does not fail the resulting Leadership test, until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in that unit have both the [LETHAL HITS] and [SUSTAINED HITS 1] abilities instead of just one.

abilities.name: Devoted to Destruction
abilities.description: If this model is equipped with two ranged weapons, each time it makes a ranged attack, add 1 to the Hit roll. If equipped with two melee weapons, each time it makes a melee attack, add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of those weapons.

abilities.name: Deadly Demise D3
abilities.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers D3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Daemonic Ordnance
abilities.description: Each time this model is selected to shoot, you can use this ability. If you do, until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by this model have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] and [HAZARDOUS] abilities.

abilities.name: Damaged: 1-4 Wounds Remaining
abilities.description: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Deadly Demise D3
abilities.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers D3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Siege Crawler
abilities.description: You can ignore any or all modifiers to this model's Move characteristic and to any Advance and Charge rolls made for this model.

abilities.name: Damaged: 1-4 Wounds Remaining
abilities.description: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: This model can be attached to the following units: Chaos Terminator Squad.

abilities.name: Deep Strike
abilities.description: This unit can be set up in Reserves and deployed more than 9" from enemy models.

abilities.name: Paragon of Hatred (Aura)
abilities.description: While a friendly HERETIC ASTARTES unit is within 6" of this model, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Mark of Chaos Ascendant (Aura)
abilities.description: While a friendly HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY or HERETIC ASTARTES MOUNTED unit is within 6" of this model, models in that unit have a 4+ invulnerable save.

abilities.name: Lord of the Traitor Legions
abilities.description: While a friendly HERETIC ASTARTES unit is within 6" of this model, you can re-roll Leadership tests and Battle-shock tests taken for that unit.

abilities.name: Lord of Chaos
abilities.description: Once per battle round, one HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army with this ability can use it when targeted by a Stratagem. If it does, reduce the CP cost of that Stratagem by 1CP.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: This model can be attached to Chosen, Havocs, Legionaries, or Nemesis Claw units.

abilities.name: Warpsmith
abilities.description: While this model is within 3" of one or more friendly HERETIC ASTARTES VEHICLE units, it has the Lone Operative ability.

abilities.name: Master of Mechanisms
abilities.description: In your Command phase, select one friendly HERETIC ASTARTES VEHICLE unit within 3" of this model. That unit regains D3 lost wounds and, until the start of your next Command phase, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Enrage Machine Spirits
abilities.description: At the end of your Movement phase, select one enemy VEHICLE unit within 12" of and visible to this model. That unit must take a Battle-shock test.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: This model can be attached to Chosen, Legionaries, Nemesis Claw, or Possessed units.

abilities.name: Daemonkin (Psychic)
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, add 1 to Advance and Charge rolls made for that unit.

abilities.name: Sacrificial Dagger
abilities.description: Once per phase, when this model's unit is selected to shoot or fight, it can use this ability. If it does, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound and, until the end of the phase, each time this model makes a Psychic Attack, add 1 to the Hit roll and add 1 to the Wound roll.

abilities.name: Deadly Demise D3
abilities.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers D3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Deep Strike
abilities.description: This unit can be set up in Reserves instead of being set up on the battlefield. If it is, it can be set up in the Reinforcements step of any of your Movement phases, anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" away from all enemy models.

abilities.name: Daemonic Allegiance
abilities.description: When this unit is added to your army, select one: KHORNE (+2 Strength to melee weapons), TZEENTCH (+3 Attacks to infernal cannon), NURGLE (+1 Toughness), or SLAANESH (+2" Movement).

abilities.name: Daemonic Destruction
abilities.description: Each time this model ends a Charge move, you can select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of this model and roll one D6 for each wound this model has remaining: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds).

abilities.name: Flying Horror
abilities.description: Each time this model ends a Normal or Advance move, you can select one enemy unit it moved over during that move. That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: This model can be attached to a Chaos Terminator Squad unit.

abilities.name: Deep Strike
abilities.description: This unit can be set up in Reserves instead of being set up on the battlefield.

abilities.name: Warptime (Psychic)
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, you can re-roll Advance and Charge rolls made for that unit.

abilities.name: Death Hex (Psychic)
abilities.description: At the start of your Shooting phase, you can select one enemy unit within 12" of and visible to this model and roll one D6: on a 1, this model's unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 2+, until the start of your next Movement phase, each time an attack is made against that enemy unit, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

units.name: Dark Commune
units.composition: 1 Cult Demagogue (1W), 1 Mindwitch, 1 Iconarch, 2 Blessed Blades (all others 4W total)

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: This unit can be attached to a Cultist Mob or Accursed Cultists unit.

abilities.name: Faithful Flock
abilities.description: While this unit contains the Cult Demagogue model and is leading a unit, models in that unit have a 5+ invulnerable save.

abilities.name: Dark Ritual
abilities.description: Once per battle, in your Command phase, this unit can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the turn, this unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced and, until the end of the turn, each time a model in this unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll and add 1 to the Wound roll.

abilities.name: Chaos Icon
abilities.description: Each time this unit takes a Leadership test for the Dark Pacts ability, you can re-roll that test.

abilities.name: Corrupt Machine Spirits
abilities.description: At the start of your Shooting phase, you can select one enemy VEHICLE unit within 12" of and visible to this model. Roll one D6: on a 2-3, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 4-5, that unit suffers 3 mortal wounds; on a 6, that unit suffers D3+3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Spirit Thief
abilities.description: At the start of your Shooting phase, you can select one enemy VEHICLE unit within 12" of and visible to this model. Until the end of the phase, each time a friendly HERETIC ASTARTES model makes an attack that targets that unit, you can re-roll a Wound roll of 1.

abilities.name: Outmanoeuvre
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a melee attack, if this unit made a Charge move this turn, add 1 to the Strength characteristic of that attack.

units.name: Chaos Rhino

abilities.name: Deadly Demise D3
abilities.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers D3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Firing Deck 2
abilities.description: Each time this Transport shoots, select up to 2 models embarked within it. Until that shooting is resolved, this model counts as equipped with all ranged weapons those embarked models are equipped with.

abilities.name: Self Repair
abilities.description: At the start of your Command phase, this model regains 1 lost wound.

units.transportCapacity: 12 HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY models. Cannot transport TERMINATOR, JUMP PACK, OBLITERATOR, or POSSESSED models.

abilities.name: Deadly Demise D3
abilities.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers D3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Soul Eater
abilities.description: At the end of the Fight phase, if one or more enemy units were destroyed by attacks made by this model this phase, until the end of the battle, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this model's weapons.

abilities.name: Deadly Demise D3
abilities.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers D3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Daemonforge
abilities.description: Each time this model is selected to fight, you can use this ability. If you do, until the end of the phase, each time this model makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.

abilities.name: Scuttling Walker
abilities.description: Each time this model makes a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, it can move over friendly MONSTER and VEHICLE models and terrain features that are 4" or less in height as if they were not there.

abilities.name: Damaged: 1-5 Wounds Remaining
abilities.description: While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Deadly Demise D3
abilities.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers D3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Hover
abilities.description: This model can Hover. In your Movement phase, you can choose not to move this model. If you do, it can shoot as normal this turn.

abilities.name: Airborne Predator
abilities.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets a unit that can FLY, add 1 to the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Terrifying Crescendo
abilities.description: In your Shooting phase, after this unit has shot, select one enemy unit that was hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the start of your next Shooting phase, each time that enemy unit takes a Battle-shock test or a Leadership test, subtract 1 from that test.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: This model can be attached to a Raptors unit.

abilities.name: Deep Strike
abilities.description: This unit can be set up in Reserves instead of being set up on the battlefield.

abilities.name: Lord of Chaos
abilities.description: Once per battle round, one HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army with this ability can use it when targeted by a Stratagem. If it does, reduce the CP cost of that Stratagem by 1CP.

abilities.name: Cruel Hunter
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a Pile-in or Consolidation move, it can move up to 6" instead of up to 3".

abilities.name: Blood Surge
abilities.description: In your opponent's Shooting phase, after an enemy unit has selected its targets, if one or more models in this unit were destroyed as a result of attacks made by that enemy unit, this unit can make a Blood Surge move. When doing so, roll one D6 and add 2 to the result: each model in this unit can move a distance in inches up to the result, moving toward the nearest enemy unit. This unit can move within Engagement Range of enemy units.

abilities.name: Icon of Khorne
abilities.description: Each time this unit destroys an enemy unit, it gains 1 Bloodshed point. When this unit makes a Blessings of Khorne roll, roll one additional D6 for each Bloodshed point it has.

units.name: Chaos Land Raider

abilities.name: Deadly Demise D6
abilities.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers D6 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Assault Ramp
abilities.description: Each time a unit disembarks from this model after it has made a Normal move, that unit is still eligible to declare a charge this turn.

abilities.name: Damaged: 1-5 Wounds Remaining
abilities.description: While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

units.transportCapacity: 12 HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY models. Cannot transport OBLITERATOR or JUMP PACK models. POSSESSED and TERMINATOR models each count as 2 models.

abilities.name: Deadly Demise D3
abilities.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers D3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Annihilator
abilities.description: Each time a ranged attack made by this model targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, you can re-roll the Damage roll.

abilities.name: Damaged: 1-4 Wounds Remaining
abilities.description: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Deadly Demise D3
abilities.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers D3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Destructor
abilities.description: Each time a ranged attack made by this model targets an enemy INFANTRY unit, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

abilities.name: Damaged: 1-4 Wounds Remaining
abilities.description: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Deadly Demise D3
abilities.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers D3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Siege Shield
abilities.description: This model does not suffer the penalty to its Hit rolls for making ranged attacks while enemy units are within Engagement Range of it. In addition, ranged weapons equipped by this model can target enemy units within Engagement Range of it, but only if no other friendly units are also within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.

abilities.name: Damaged: 1-4 Wounds Remaining
abilities.description: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

choices.name: Flamer / Meltagun / Plasma Gun / Grenade Launcher / Sniper Rifle

abilities.name: Twisted Defence Force
abilities.description: While this unit is within range of an objective marker, each time a ranged attack targets this unit, models in this unit have the Benefit of Cover against that attack.

abilities.name: Bestial Raiders
abilities.description: This unit can be set up in Strategic Reserves. When in Strategic Reserves, treat the current battle round number as being one higher than it actually is for the purposes of determining when this unit can arrive from Strategic Reserves.

abilities.name: Lone Operative
abilities.description: Unless part of an Attached unit, this unit can only be selected as the target of a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 12".

abilities.name: Agent of Discord (Aura)
abilities.description: Each time an enemy unit is targeted by a Stratagem, if that enemy unit is within 12" of this model, increase the cost of that Stratagem by 1CP.

abilities.name: Guns Blazing
abilities.description: Once per turn, in your opponent's Shooting phase, when an enemy unit targets a friendly HERETIC ASTARTES unit within 3" of this model, this model can shoot at that enemy unit as if it were your Shooting phase.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: This model can be attached to a Chosen or Legionaries unit.

abilities.name: The Tyrant of Badab
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in that unit.

abilities.name: Red Corsairs
abilities.description: After both players have deployed their armies, select up to three HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY units from your army and redeploy them into Strategic Reserves, regardless of how many units are already in Strategic Reserves and regardless of any restrictions placed on when those units can arrive from Strategic Reserves.

abilities.name: Hamadrya's Knowledge (Psychic)
abilities.description: Once per battle, when an enemy unit ends a move within 9" of this model and this model's unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, this model's unit can make a Normal move of up to D6".

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: This model can be attached to an Accursed Cultists or Cultist Mob unit.

abilities.name: Fiery Faith
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, you can re-roll Leadership tests taken for that unit.

abilities.name: Cursed Flames
abilities.description: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one enemy INFANTRY unit that was hit by one or more of those attacks. That unit must take a Battle-shock test.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: This model can be attached to Accursed Cultists, Chosen, Cultist Mob, or Legionaries.

abilities.name: Enhanced Warriors
abilities.description: If this unit is attached to a unit at the start of battle, add 1 to Strength of melee weapons and 1 to Toughness of Bodyguard models in that unit.

abilities.name: Surgeon Acolyte
abilities.description: Once per turn, when an attack is allocated to a model in this unit, if this unit contains Fabius Bile, you can change the Damage characteristic of that attack to 0.

abilities.name: Chirurgeon
abilities.description: The first time this unit's Fabius Bile model is destroyed, at the end of the phase roll one D6: on a 2+, set it back up on the battlefield, as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy models, with its full wounds remaining.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: This model can be attached to a Raptors unit.

abilities.name: Head Taker
abilities.description: Each time this model's unit makes a Charge move, roll one D6 for each model in this model's unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units: for each 4+, one enemy unit within Engagement Range suffers 1 mortal wound.

abilities.name: Herald of the Apocalypse (Aura)
abilities.description: While an enemy unit is within 6" of this model, each time that enemy unit takes a Battle-shock test, if it is below its Starting Strength, it must take that test as if it were below Half-strength instead.

abilities.name: Unholy Mechanisms (Aura)
abilities.description: While a friendly DAEMON VEHICLE unit is within 6" of this model, add 2 to the Strength characteristic of weapons equipped by models in that unit.

abilities.name: Reorder Reality
abilities.description: Each time a ranged attack targets this model, if the attacking model is within 18", subtract 1 from the Hit roll. After that attacking unit has finished making its attacks, if any of those attacks targeted this model, ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [HAZARDOUS] ability until the end of the phase.

abilities.name: Indentured Daemon Engines
abilities.description: While this model is within 3" of one or more friendly DAEMON VEHICLE units, this model has the Lone Operative ability.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: This unit can be attached to a Traitor Guardsmen Squad.

abilities.name: Brutal Example
abilities.description: Once per turn, while this unit is leading a unit and contains a TRAITOR ENFORCER model, you can target that unit with the Fire Overwatch Stratagem for 0CP, and can do so even if you have already targeted a different unit from your army with that Stratagem this turn.

abilities.name: Mutated Bodyguard
abilities.description: While this unit contains a Traitor Ogryn model, CHARACTER models in this unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.

abilities.name: Nurgle's Gift (Aura)
abilities.description: In your Shooting phase, each time this unit is selected to shoot, after this unit has shot, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the start of your next turn, that enemy unit is Afflicted.

abilities.name: Icon of Despair (Aura)
abilities.description: While an enemy unit is within 6" of the bearer, worsen the Leadership characteristic of models in that unit by 1.

abilities.name: Bringers of Change
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1. If that attack targets a unit within range of an objective marker you do not control, you can re-roll the Wound roll instead.

abilities.name: Icon of Flame
abilities.description: Ranged weapons equipped by models in the bearer's unit (excluding CHARACTERS) have the [IGNORES COVER] ability.

abilities.name: Termite Assault
abilities.description: This model must start the battle in Reserves, but neither it nor any units embarked within it are counted towards any limits placed on the maximum number of Reserves units you can start the battle with. This model can be set up in the Reinforcements step of your first, second or third Movement phase, regardless of any mission rules. Any units embarked within this model can disembark after it has been set up on the battlefield, and if they do they must be set up more than 9" away from all enemy models.

abilities.name: Damaged: 1-5 Wounds Remaining
abilities.description: While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Malevolent Locus (Aura)
abilities.description: While a friendly HERETIC ASTARTES unit is wholly within 9" of this FORTIFICATION, improve that unit's Leadership characteristic by 1.

abilities.name: Malign Cover
abilities.description: Each time a ranged attack is allocated to a model, if that model is not fully visible to every model in the attacking unit because of this FORTIFICATION, that model has the Benefit of Cover against that attack.

abilities.name: Fortification
abilities.description: While an enemy unit is only within Engagement Range of one or more FORTIFICATIONS from your army: that unit can still be selected as the target of ranged attacks, but each time such an attack is made, unless it is made with a Pistol weapon, subtract 1 from the Hit roll; models in that unit do not need to take Desperate Escape tests due to Falling Back while Battle-shocked.

abilities.name: Plough Through the Enemy
abilities.description: Each time this model destroys an enemy unit in the Fight phase, every enemy unit within 6" of this model must take a Battle-shock test.

abilities.name: Damaged: 1-8 Wounds Remaining
abilities.description: While this model has 1-8 wounds remaining, subtract 4 from its Objective Control characteristic and each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Stealth
abilities.description: This unit has the Benefit of Cover.

abilities.name: Visions of Suffering (Psychic)
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack that targets an enemy unit that is below its Starting Strength, add 1 to the Hit roll. If that enemy unit is Below Half-strength, add 1 to the Wound roll as well.

abilities.name: Voice Eater
abilities.description: Enemy units (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES) cannot be targeted with Stratagems while they are within Engagement Range of the bearer's unit.

rules.name: Eye of the Gods
rules.description: When you add a unit to your army, if that unit is not an EPIC HERO and does not already have one of the following keywords, you must select one: KHORNE, TZEENTCH, NURGLE, SLAANESH, or CHAOS UNDIVIDED. Each time a unit with one of these keywords gains a weapon ability as the result of a Dark Pact and does not fail the resulting Leadership test, that unit gains an additional bonus based on its Mark of Chaos.

marks.name: Khorne
marks.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a melee attack, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

marks.name: Tzeentch
marks.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

marks.name: Nurgle
marks.description: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack, an unmodified Wound roll of 5+ scores a Critical Wound.

marks.name: Slaanesh
marks.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a melee attack, if that model made a Charge move this turn, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

marks.name: Chaos Undivided
marks.description: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack, you can re-roll a Hit roll of 1 and you can re-roll a Wound roll of 1.

stratagems.name: Profane Zeal
stratagems.description: Select one HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can re-roll a Hit roll of 1 and you can re-roll a Wound roll of 1. If your unit has the CHAOS UNDIVIDED keyword, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll instead.

stratagems.name: Dark Obscuration
stratagems.description: Select one HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks. Until the end of the phase, your unit has the Stealth ability. If your unit has the NURGLE keyword, until the end of the phase, it can only be selected as the target of a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 12".

stratagems.name: Infernal Rites
stratagems.description: Select one HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of that enemy unit's attacks. Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.name: Skinshift
stratagems.description: Select one HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army. One model in your unit regains up to 3 lost wounds. If your unit has the TZEENTCH keyword and is below its Starting Strength, one destroyed model (excluding CHARACTER models) is returned to your unit with its full wounds remaining.

stratagems.name: Eternal Hate
stratagems.description: Select one HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6: on a 4+, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking model's unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play. If your unit has the KHORNE keyword, add 1 to that roll.

stratagems.name: Unnatural Swiftness
stratagems.description: Use this Stratagem after a HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army Falls Back. Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge. If your unit has the SLAANESH keyword, until the end of the turn, your unit is also eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

enhancements.name: Liber Hereticus
enhancements.description: HERETIC ASTARTES CHAOS UNDIVIDED model only. Each time the bearer's unit makes a Dark Pact, if it does not fail the Leadership test, until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in that unit have both the [LETHAL HITS] and [SUSTAINED HITS 1] abilities instead of just one.

enhancements.name: Talisman of Burning Blood
enhancements.description: HERETIC ASTARTES KHORNE model only. Add 1 to the Attacks and Strength characteristics of the bearer's melee weapons. Each time the bearer's unit makes a Dark Pact, until the end of the phase, add D3 to the Attacks and Strength characteristics of the bearer's melee weapons instead.

enhancements.name: Eye of Tzeentch
enhancements.description: HERETIC ASTARTES TZEENTCH model only. Each time the bearer's unit makes a Dark Pact, if it does not fail the resulting Leadership test, you gain 1CP.

enhancements.name: Orbs of Unlife
enhancements.description: HERETIC ASTARTES NURGLE model only. At the end of the Fight phase, roll one D6 for each enemy unit within 6" of the bearer: on a 4+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. If the bearer's unit made a Dark Pact this phase, add 1 to each of those rolls.

rules.name: Focus of Hatred
rules.description: At the start of your Command phase, select one enemy unit. Until the start of your next Command phase, each time a friendly non-DAMNED HERETIC ASTARTES unit makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

stratagems.name: Contemptuous Disregard
stratagems.description: When a HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army is selected as the target of an attack, until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets that unit, worsen the Armor Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.name: Millennia of Experience
stratagems.description: When an enemy unit ends a move within 9" of one of your HERETIC ASTARTES units, your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6".

stratagems.name: Bringers of Despair
stratagems.description: Select one non-DAMNED HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army. Until the end of the phase, that unit has the Fights First ability, but only when targeting your Focus of Hatred.

stratagems.name: Black Crusade
stratagems.description: Select one HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army. Until the end of the turn, that unit can shoot in a turn in which it Advanced or Fell Back. In addition, bolt weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability this turn.

stratagems.name: Let the Galaxy Burn
stratagems.description: Select one HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army. Until the end of the phase, ranged attacks made by that unit ignore the benefits of cover. In addition, flamer weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.

stratagems.name: Endless Ire
stratagems.description: Select one HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that destroyed an enemy unit this phase. That unit can consolidate up to 6" instead of 3".

enhancements.name: Mark of Legend
enhancements.description: HERETIC ASTARTES model only. Once per turn, you can re-roll one Hit roll, one Wound roll, or one saving throw made for the bearer.

enhancements.name: Eye of Abaddon
enhancements.description: HERETIC ASTARTES model only. Each time the bearer's unit destroys an enemy unit that is your Focus of Hatred, you gain 1CP.

enhancements.name: Warmaster's Gift
enhancements.description: HERETIC ASTARTES model only. Each time the bearer makes an attack, an unmodified Wound roll of 5+ scores a Critical Wound.

enhancements.name: Eager for Vengeance
enhancements.description: HERETIC ASTARTES model only. The bearer's unit can Fall Back, shoot, and charge in the same turn. In addition, each time the bearer's unit targets your Focus of Hatred, add 1 to the Hit roll and add 1 to Charge rolls made for that unit.

coreStratagems.name: Command Re-roll
coreStratagems.when: In any phase, just after you have made a Hit roll, a Wound roll, a Damage roll, a saving throw, an Advance roll, a Charge roll, a Desperate Escape test, a Hazardous test, or just after you have rolled the dice to determine the number of attacks made with a weapon.
coreStratagems.target: An attack, model or unit from your army.
coreStratagems.effect: You re-roll that roll, test or saving throw.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: In any phase, just after you have made a Hit roll, a Wound roll, a Damage roll, a saving throw, an Advance roll, a Charge roll, a Desperate Escape test, a Hazardous test, or just after you have rolled the dice to determine the number of attacks made with a weapon. TARGET: An attack, model or unit from your army. EFFECT: You re-roll that roll, test or saving throw.

coreStratagems.name: Counter-offensive
coreStratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has fought.
coreStratagems.target: One unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and that has not already been selected to fight this phase.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has fought. TARGET: One unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and that has not already been selected to fight this phase. EFFECT: Your unit fights next.

coreStratagems.name: Epic Challenge
coreStratagems.when: Fight phase, when a CHARACTER unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more Attached units is selected to fight.
coreStratagems.target: One CHARACTER model in your unit.
coreStratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, all melee attacks made by that model have the [PRECISION] ability.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Fight phase, when a CHARACTER unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more Attached units is selected to fight. TARGET: One CHARACTER model in your unit. EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, all melee attacks made by that model have the [PRECISION] ability.

coreStratagems.name: Fire Overwatch
coreStratagems.when: Your opponent's Movement or Charge phase, just after an enemy unit is set up or when an enemy unit starts or ends a Normal, Advance, Fall Back or Charge move.
coreStratagems.target: One unit from your army that is within 24" of that enemy unit and that would be eligible to shoot if it were your Shooting phase.
coreStratagems.effect: Your unit can shoot that enemy unit as if it were your Shooting phase.
coreStratagems.restrictions: An unmodified Hit roll of 6 is required to score a hit. You can only use this Stratagem once per turn.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Your opponent's Movement or Charge phase, just after an enemy unit is set up or when an enemy unit starts or ends a Normal, Advance, Fall Back or Charge move. TARGET: One unit from your army that is within 24" of that enemy unit and that would be eligible to shoot if it were your Shooting phase. EFFECT: Your unit can shoot that enemy unit as if it were your Shooting phase. RESTRICTIONS: An unmodified Hit roll of 6 is required to score a hit. You can only use this Stratagem once per turn.

coreStratagems.name: Go to Ground
coreStratagems.when: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
coreStratagems.target: One INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
coreStratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, all models in your unit have a 6+ invulnerable save and have the Benefit of Cover.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets. TARGET: One INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks. EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, all models in your unit have a 6+ invulnerable save and have the Benefit of Cover.

coreStratagems.name: Grenade
coreStratagems.target: One GRENADES unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of any enemy units and has not been selected to shoot this phase.
coreStratagems.effect: Select one enemy unit that is not within Engagement Range of any units from your army and is within 8" of and visible to your GRENADES unit. Roll six D6: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Your Shooting phase. TARGET: One GRENADES unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of any enemy units and has not been selected to shoot this phase. EFFECT: Select one enemy unit that is not within Engagement Range of any units from your army and is within 8" of and visible to your GRENADES unit. Roll six D6: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

coreStratagems.name: Heroic Intervention
coreStratagems.when: Your opponent's Charge phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Charge move.
coreStratagems.target: One unit from your army that is within 6" of that enemy unit and would be eligible to declare a charge against that enemy unit if it were your Charge phase.
coreStratagems.effect: Your unit now declares a charge that targets only that enemy unit, and you resolve that charge as if it were your Charge phase.
coreStratagems.restrictions: You can only select a VEHICLE unit if it is a WALKER. Your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Your opponent's Charge phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Charge move. TARGET: One unit from your army that is within 6" of that enemy unit and would be eligible to declare a charge against that enemy unit if it were your Charge phase. EFFECT: Your unit now declares a charge that targets only that enemy unit, and you resolve that charge as if it were your Charge phase. RESTRICTIONS: You can only select a VEHICLE unit if it is a WALKER. Your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.

coreStratagems.name: Insane Bravery
coreStratagems.when: Battle-shock step of your Command phase, just after you have failed a Battle-shock test taken for a unit from your army.
coreStratagems.target: The unit from your army that Battle-shock test was just taken for (even though your Battle-shocked units cannot normally be affected by your Stratagems).
coreStratagems.effect: Your unit is treated as having passed that test instead, and is not Battle-shocked as a result.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Battle-shock step of your Command phase, just after you have failed a Battle-shock test taken for a unit from your army. TARGET: The unit from your army that Battle-shock test was just taken for (even though your Battle-shocked units cannot normally be affected by your Stratagems). EFFECT: Your unit is treated as having passed that test instead, and is not Battle-shocked as a result.

coreStratagems.name: Rapid Ingress
coreStratagems.when: End of your opponent's Movement phase.
coreStratagems.target: One unit from your army that is in Reserves.
coreStratagems.effect: Your unit can arrive on the battlefield as if it were the Reinforcements step of your Movement phase.
coreStratagems.restrictions: You cannot use this Stratagem to enable a unit to arrive during a battle round it would not normally be able to do so in.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: End of your opponent's Movement phase. TARGET: One unit from your army that is in Reserves. EFFECT: Your unit can arrive on the battlefield as if it were the Reinforcements step of your Movement phase. RESTRICTIONS: You cannot use this Stratagem to enable a unit to arrive during a battle round it would not normally be able to do so in.

coreStratagems.name: Tank Shock
coreStratagems.target: One VEHICLE unit from your army.
coreStratagems.effect: After your unit ends a Charge move, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it, then select one melee weapon your unit is equipped with. Roll a number of D6 equal to that weapon's Strength characteristic. If that Strength characteristic is greater than that enemy unit's Toughness characteristic, roll two additional D6. For each 5+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds).
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Your Charge phase. TARGET: One VEHICLE unit from your army. EFFECT: After your unit ends a Charge move, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it, then select one melee weapon your unit is equipped with. Roll a number of D6 equal to that weapon's Strength characteristic. If that Strength characteristic is greater than that enemy unit's Toughness characteristic, roll two additional D6. For each 5+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds).

dark_pacts.name: Dark Pacts
dark_pacts.description: Each time a HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army is selected to shoot or fight, it can make a Dark Pact. If it does, it must first take a Leadership test; if that test is failed, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. Then, select one of the following abilities for weapons equipped by models in that unit to gain until the end of the phase: [LETHAL HITS] or [SUSTAINED HITS 1].

choices.name: Lethal Hits
choices.description: Critical hits (unmodified hit rolls of 6) automatically wound the target.

choices.name: Sustained Hits 1
choices.description: Critical hits (unmodified hit rolls of 6) generate 1 additional hit.

weaponKeywords.Devastating Wounds: Critical wounds (unmodified wound roll of 6) inflict mortal wounds equal to the Damage characteristic, and the attack sequence ends.
weaponKeywords.Lethal Hits: Critical hits (unmodified hit roll of 6) automatically wound the target.
weaponKeywords.Sustained Hits: Critical hits generate additional hits (number specified after the ability name).
weaponKeywords.Assault: Can shoot after Advancing (at -1 to hit).
weaponKeywords.Pistol: Can shoot in Engagement Range, but only at units within Engagement Range.
weaponKeywords.Blast: +1 attack per 5 models in target unit (minimum 3 attacks vs 6+ models).
weaponKeywords.Rapid Fire: Double the Attacks characteristic when targeting within half range.
weaponKeywords.Heavy: +1 to hit if the bearer's unit Remained Stationary this turn.
weaponKeywords.Anti-: Improves wound roll against targets with the specified keyword (e.g., Anti-Vehicle 4+ wounds on 4+ vs Vehicles).
weaponKeywords.Hazardous: After resolving attacks, roll one D6. On a 1, bearer suffers 3 mortal wounds.
weaponKeywords.Psychic: This is a Psychic Attack. Some abilities and rules specifically interact with Psychic attacks.
weaponKeywords.Precision: On critical wounds, attacker can allocate wound to a Character or Attached model.
weaponKeywords.Extra Attacks: These attacks are made in addition to the bearer's normal attacks, using the weapon's profile.
weaponKeywords.Ignores Cover: The target does not receive the benefit of cover against attacks with this ability.
weaponKeywords.Indirect Fire: Can target units not visible to the bearer, but subtract 1 from Hit rolls when doing so.
weaponKeywords.Melta: When targeting within half range, add X to the Damage characteristic (Melta 2 = +2 Damage).

weapon.name: Anti-X #+
weapon.description: Improve wound roll against targets with keyword X, wounding on #+.

weapon.name: Assault
weapon.description: Can be shot after Advancing.

weapon.name: Blast
weapon.description: +1 Attack per 5 models in target unit.

weapon.name: Devastating Wounds
weapon.description: Critical wounds inflict mortal wounds equal to Damage, no saves allowed.

weapon.name: Extra Attacks
weapon.description: Attacks with this weapon are made in addition to other weapons.

weapon.name: Hazardous
weapon.description: After resolving attacks, roll D6. On 1, bearer suffers 3 mortal wounds (Characters) or is destroyed (other models).

weapon.name: Heavy
weapon.description: +1 to Hit if unit Remained Stationary.

weapon.name: Ignores Cover
weapon.description: Target does not benefit from cover.

weapon.name: Indirect Fire
weapon.description: Can target units not visible. -1 to Hit, +1 to target's Save if not visible.

weapon.name: Lance
weapon.description: +1 to Wound if unit charged this turn.

weapon.name: Lethal Hits
weapon.description: Critical hits automatically wound (no wound roll needed).

weapon.name: Melta X
weapon.description: +X Damage against targets within half range.

weapon.name: One Shot
weapon.description: Can only be used once per battle.

weapon.name: Pistol
weapon.description: Can be shot in Engagement Range, but only at units in Engagement Range.

weapon.name: Precision
weapon.description: On critical wounds, attacker can allocate wound to a Character or Attached model.

weapon.name: Psychic
weapon.description: Weapon has the Psychic keyword for ability interactions.

weapon.name: Rapid Fire X
weapon.description: +X Attacks when targeting units within half range.

weapon.name: Sustained Hits X
weapon.description: Critical hits score X additional hits.

weapon.name: Torrent
weapon.description: Automatically hits (no hit roll needed).

weapon.name: Twin-linked
weapon.description: Re-roll wound rolls.

faction.name: Dark Pacts
faction.description: When a HERETIC ASTARTES unit shoots or fights, it can take a Leadership test to gain either [LETHAL HITS] or [SUSTAINED HITS 1] on all its weapons until the end of the phase. On a failed test, the unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

faction.name: Heretic Astartes
faction.description: The faction keyword for all Chaos Space Marine units. Represents the corrupted Adeptus Astartes who have turned from the Emperor's light.

faction.name: Chaos
faction.description: Units aligned with the Ruinous Powers. This keyword interacts with many abilities and stratagems across Chaos factions.

faction.name: Daemon
faction.description: Units that are partially or fully composed of daemonic entities. Daemons often have invulnerable saves and special abilities.

faction.name: Damned
faction.description: Mortal followers of Chaos who have sworn themselves to the Dark Gods. Includes Cultists and other non-Astartes servants.

unit.name: Battleline
unit.description: Core troop units. May have special rules in certain detachments.

unit.name: Character
unit.description: Can lead units, receive Enhancements, and is targeted by Precision.

unit.name: Monster
unit.description: Large creatures with powerful stats. Often have high Toughness, many Wounds, and Deadly Demise.

unit.name: Psyker
unit.description: Can use Psychic abilities. Chaos Psykers channel the power of the Warp through dark rituals.

unit.name: Leader
unit.description: Can be attached to Bodyguard units. Abilities affect the combined unit.

unit.name: Feel No Pain X+
unit.description: Roll D6 when losing a wound. On X+, wound is ignored.

unit.name: Deadly Demise X
unit.description: When destroyed, roll D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers X mortal wounds.

unit.name: Scouts X"
unit.description: Make a Normal move of up to X" before first turn begins.

unit.name: Deep Strike
unit.description: During deployment, can be set up in Reserves. Can arrive anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" from enemy models.

unit.name: Epic Hero
unit.description: Unique named character. Limited to 1 per army.

unit.name: Terminator
unit.description: Elite infantry in Terminator armor. Typically have 2+ Save, 4+ Invulnerable, and Deep Strike.
